title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. II, Forms (cf. Part 110), form N - Order of conditions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. II, Forms (cf. Part 110), form N - Order of conditions

State Regulations
FORM N
ORDER OF CONDITIONS
STATE OF NEW YORK
SUPREME COURT COUNTY COURT
PART: ________ COUNTY: ____________
________
IN THE MATTER
of

An order of Conditions Pursuant to
C PL 330.20 in Relation to
________
Defendant
________
Present: Honorable ____________
Justice of the Supreme Court

Judge of the County Court

The above-named defendant having been found
not responsible by reason of mental disease or defect, And, this court at the initial hearing
conducted pursuant to subdivision 6 of C PL 330.20 having found that the
above-named defendant is mentally ill but does not have a dangerous mental
disorder, and this court having issued on this date a civil order committing
the above-named defendant to the custody of the State Commissioner of Mental

Health for care and treatment pursuant to the applicable provisions of the

Mental Hygiene Law, And, this court at the initial hearing
conducted pursuant to subdivision 6 of C PL 330.20 having found that the
above-named defendant does not have a dangerous mental disorder and is not
mentally ill, and this court having issued on this date an order, pursuant to
the provisions of subdivision 7 of C PL 330.20, discharging the above-named
defendant subject to this order of conditions, And, this court having issued on this date a
transfer order pursuant to the provisions of subdivision 11 of C PL
330.20, And, this court having issued on this date a
release order pursuant to the provisions of subdivision 12 of C PL
330.20, NOW, THEREFORE, it is
ORDERED that the above-named defendant
comply with each term and condition of the treatment plan prescribed for the
said defendant by the State Office of Mental Health, and it is further
ORDERED that whenever the above-named
defendant is in the custody of the Commissioner of Mental Health and confined
to a facility under the jurisdiction of the said Commissioner or in a facility
designated by the said Commissioner, the said defendant shall not leave that
facility without authorization, and it is further
ORDERED that if this order is issued in
conjunction with a release order issued pursuant to subdivision 12 of C PL
330.20, the above-named defendant shall comply with each term and condition
prescribed in the written service plan annexed to this order and made a part
hereof, and it is further
ORDERED that the above-named defendant shall
comply with the following condition or conditions: [Here insert any other
condition which the court determines to be reasonably necessary or appropriate]
____________
____________
____________
____________
____________
____________
____________
____________
____________, and it is further
ORDERED that the above-named defendant
comply with this order for a period of five years from the date of the issuance
of this order, unless the court shall sooner terminate this order, or unless
the court, for good cause shown, shall extend the period for an additional five
years. Dated: ________
____________
Justice of the Supreme Court

Judge of the County Court
